content: We remain focused on capitalizing on the market conditions, while prioritizing longer-term initiatives, like diversifying our revenue streams in both segments, continuously improving core operational efficiencies, through automation and disciplined process control levers, as well as developing best-in-class commercial and consumer excellence to retain our loyal customers and further cement ourselves as a premier solution provider. Gross profit increased significantly to $22.5 million, compared to $8.7 million in the first quarter of 2021, while gross margin increased 690 basis points to 19.4% from 12.5% in the prior year period.
